        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> add(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> arr)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: ParentController
        Will add the object to the DataBase
        Specified by:
        add in interface IShipmentController
        Specified by:
        add in class ParentController
        Parameters:
        arr - always will contain 2 Objects: The first one (get(0)) is the Object to add to the DataBase (Depend on the Controller) The second one (get(1)) is Boolean that indicates if we want to get the new Object's id
        Returns:
        ArrayList that contains the answer: if the Boolean=true, will contain the BigInteger id else, will contain true
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
